tool.name: GDAL addo
tool.command: gdaladdo '$input1' -ro #unless $levels=="eg : 2 4 8 16" $levels #end unless --config COMPRESS_OVERVIEW DEFLATE && cp $input1'.ovr' output_ovr

param.name: levels
param.label: levels
param.help: A list of integral overview levels to build. Ignored with -clean option.

tool.help:
The gdaladdo utility can be used to build or rebuild overview images for most supported file formats with one of several downsampling algorithms.
http://www.gdal.org
http://www.gdal.org/gdaladdo.html
